name: CONCILIUS Europe SPRL
goal: CONCILIUS Europe serves as advisor and facilitator in the field of government relations and as partner for companies and organisations in the representation of their interests towards the public sector. Our consultants advise companies and organisations on the growing complexity of the EU decision-making structure and legislative procedures. We assist our clients in their relations with the EU institutions and Member States by combining their expertise with our profound understanding of the multifaceted administrative processes. We identify and propose funding opportunities and help negotiate individual funding packages four our clients.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: MFF, FP9, Chemical and Environmental/ Climate legislation, Trade Agreements, Health und Digital Economy
customers: InterRecherche SPRL,CONCILIUS AG,FIPRA International Ltd UK
